section.title: CreateAutomationRequest
section.para: This method initiates an automation request. Use it to drive an automation workflow and provide feedback to the requester.

formalpara.title: Examples
formalpara.para: The following examples demonstrate CreateAutomationRequest usage:

example.title: CreateAutomationRequest WSDL
example.programlisting: <message name="CreateAutomationRequest"> <part name="version" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="uri_parts" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="parameters" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="requester" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="CreateAutomationRequestResponse"> <part name="return" type="xsd:string"/> </message>
